dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights
Shows administrative divisions, roads, railways, towns, waterways
Includes area around Sambalpur ("Sumbulpoor" on map) in Odisha
Publishment and responsibility information not included when map was mounted
Complete coverage of map suggests publish date later than 1862 version of atlas
Atlas index available through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
